page.title: 17School Games
page.content: THERE ARE MANY GAMES THAT CHILDREN PLAY AT SCHOOL.HERE ARE SOME. OFF GROUND TAG IS WHEN THERE ARE NO DENS AND SOMEONE IS ON IT.WHEN A PERSON GETS ON GROUND THEY CAN GET TAGGED THEN THEY ARE ON IT.IF YOU ARE OFF GROUND YOU CANNOT GET TAGGED. SHADOW TAG IS WHEN YOU DRAW A LINE AND YOU HAVE TO RUN DOWN THE LINE WITHOUT GETTING TAGGED BY THE PERSONS SHADOW.IF YOU DO GET TAGGED YOU ARE ON IT. BALL TAG IS WHEN YOU HAVE A DEN AND THE PERSON WHO IS ON IT HAS A BALL,AND TRYS TO HIT A PERSON WITH THE BALL.THE PERSON WHO HAS BEEN HIT WITH THE BALL IS THEN ON IT. THESE ARE JUST SOME OF MANY GAMES WE PLAY FROM TIME TO TIME DURING THE YEAR.
